```{r}
#| label: setup

source("http://inkaverse.com/docs.r")
#> https://docs.google.com/document/d/14GM04tKBOTPZh5OUUY3qQHlpYH5kSRW_YRWuJ6hOgMw/edit#

doc <- inti::gdoc2qmd(file = "manuscript.zip")
```

```{r}
#| results: 'asis'

rticle <- knitr::knit_child(doc, quiet = TRUE)
cat(rticle, sep = '\n')
```

```{r}
knitr::knit_exit()
```
